snippet.title: Hack9 [PC] Gameplay
snippet.description:
Hack9 is a solid and challenging Cave Story-inspired doujin platformer. You can get a free copy here:
https://wahiko.itch.io/hack9

I've got a written review of Hack9 up here:
https://shmups.system11.org/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=45206&p=1386874#p1386874

The beginning of the game is pretty rough, so in this clip I show how to get an HP Boost item that should make things easier.
